post.text: I have such incredible supporters. So many people have downloaded my new America First app and they tell me it's MUCH better than Hillary's - getting TREMENDOUS reviews. Download and enjoy! http://donaldjtrump.com/app

comment.author: Chance
comment.text: Let's show some class... Stop the mud-slinging and be a professional. You are representing the Republican party... It isn't just a show of how much dirt you can show she has on herself... She's doing just fine doing that on her own. Know your facts, bring the fight to the debate where she cannot hide her opinions on crucial topics facing the country. Remember that the opponents are looking for a leader too. Give them a reason to be their leader!

replies.author: Kayla
replies.text: He's embezzling money from the Trump Foundation to pay off his attorney bills. That's real smart considering he's representing the Republican Party. He's toast at the debate.

replies.author: Chance
replies.text: Kayla ForHer do some research on the beloved Clinton Foundation and the use of Air Force One.
